pr_title: Use the fork info at the current time rather than where sync is up to

timeline.message: Use the fork info at the current time rather than where sync is up to.

timeline.bodyText: This isn't quite true is it?  There could be an additional fork after the next fork (I assume the "next fork" is supposed to be the fork after the head state fork?) that is actually active for the current slot.  I assume at some point we'll have some explicit fork config that we can query ...  Might be worth a comment with caveats + javadoc on getNextFork.   And maybe getCurrentForkInfo should be getHeadForkInfo.
timeline.author: mbaxter
